WRITING.TEXT: before you buy an m711, keep in mind that it will take a fair bit of use and wear before it starts drag clicking/ double clicking. I've had mine for a few months and its only started being able to double click a week or two ago, however other than that its a good and affordable option.

yeah its cause you have to release shift instantly when you place the block then press it again right as you get to the edge otherwise you have a slow awkward walk to the edge of the block before you can place another
you have to delete the keys then add them again
just use toggle sprint its op
